entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
